text:
Because the new coronavirus vaccine czar is classified as a contractor, rather than a government employee, he doesn’t have to fully disclose his conflicts or divest from holdings that could pose a conflict of interest. That’s seriously concerning.
https://t.co/OuBrhTA3Jg
